body: Evan, The sort answer is that you can use the solar fan for windows.  See attached for an example file showing a solar fan around a window for a solar passive house that needs solar access when it is very cold: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Rdzuenb-s8sGKw3s7XNqILTA8axrnEV1wpfODwXjsP-tgGIOZezkUoJyF6hbeKJrCgKfrDsLlIC23yUxNtmmAiq7*Tt11nBh/SolarFanForWindow.JPG) Your west facade sounds a bit different, though. -Chris
